alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 9:02AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Valley and northwestern Sherman Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 900 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Taylor to near Sargent to near Berwyn to 8 miles southwest of Ansley. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arcadia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
